OptionChoice.name: GregtechActive
OptionChoice.Comment: Controls whether Gregtech is active in the current dimension. By default, it is active in the overworld and Mystcraft ages. To disable for a specific dimension, set this to false in the CustomOreGen_Options.txt found in the dimension directory (preferably before visiting it).

OptionDisplayGroup.name: groupGregtechOres
OptionDisplayGroup.Description: Enable/disable ores for certain metals and other substances.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenOres
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Gregtech ore formations

OptionChoice.name: GregtechOverride
OptionChoice.Description: Override the corresponding generation from vanilla or other mods when we generate an equivalent GT ore. It is most efficient, but not necessary, to also (or alternatively) disable the COG generation of these ores, as well as generation options in mod configurations.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenCoal
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of coal

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenIron
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of iron (hematite, magnetite)

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenGold
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of gold. Note that even if this is disabled, some gold will still be present in association with certain ores.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenDiamond
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of diamonds, as kimberlite pipes, and embedded within certain graphite deposits.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenLapis
OptionChoice.Description: Generate lapis gems and related minerals (lazurite, sodalite).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenCopper
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of copper ore (chalcopyrite)

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenTin
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of tin ore (cassiterite)

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenAluminum
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of aluminium ore (bauxite).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenMercury
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of mercury ore (cinnabar).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenLeadZinc
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of zinc and lead ore (sphalerite, galena).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenTungsten
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of tungsten ore (scheelite, wolframite).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenNickel
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of nickel ore (pentlandite, garnierite).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenChromium
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of chromium ore (chromite).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenTitanium
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of titanium ore (ilmenite).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenMolybdenum
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of molybdenum ore (molybdenite).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenManganese
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of manganese ore (pyrolusite).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenUranium
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of uranium ore (uraninite).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenApatite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of apatite (phosphate ore).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenSalt
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of salt ore (halite).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenQuartz
OptionChoice.Description: Generate distributions of quartz.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenBIF
OptionChoice.Description: Generate sedimentary banded iron formations, primarily of hematite, with some recoverable magnetite.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenSandOres
OptionChoice.Description: Generate placer deposits (iron, tin, garnet). This is recommended if you disable vanilla iron.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenVolcanic
OptionChoice.Description: Generate volcanic ore deposits including alunite, ash, perlite, pumice and zeolite.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenSerpVeins
OptionChoice.Description: Generate serpentinite veins that are rich in soapstone, magnesite, chromite and chrysotile.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenLaterites
OptionChoice.Description: Generate ore deposits in bogs and tropical lateritic soils (bauxite, limonite, garnierite).

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenIgVeins
OptionChoice.Description: Generate ore veins in igneous rock (ilmenite, chromite, magnetite, chalcopyrite, ...)

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenIgIntrusion
OptionChoice.Description: Generate igneous intrusions where mafic rock has penetrated the upper reaches of the crust. Contain large deposits of magnetite, magnesite, pentlandite, ilmenite, and chromite.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenEvaporite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate marine evaporite deposits rich in gypsum and rock salt.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenVMS
OptionChoice.Description: Generate Volcagenic Massive Sulfide deposits, rich in sulfide ores like sphalerite, galena, and chalcopyrite.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenSEDEX
OptionChoice.Description: Generate SEDimentary EXhalative deposits rich in sphalerite, galena, scheelite, and chalcopyrite.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenPegmatite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate pegmatite veins with a rich assortment of minerals.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenCarbonate
OptionChoice.Description: Generate carbonate deposits with minerals like magnesite, soapstone, sphalerite and galena.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenBarite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate barite deposits.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenMarine
OptionChoice.Description: Generate marine-related deposits.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenGraphite
OptionChoice.Description: Generate graphite deposits in various patterns.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenClay
OptionChoice.Description: Generate mineral clay deposits, including bentonite, Fuller's earth and kaolinite.

OptionChoice.name: GregtechGenNativeOres
OptionChoice.Description: Generate deposits of native gold, silver, electrum and copper.

CloudPreset.name: PresetStratum
CloudPreset.Description: Solid clouds that form layers of rock and minerals. Individual layer generators are expected to modify the CloudHeight, CouldThickness and DistributionFrequency settings.

VeinsPreset.name: PresetRockVeins
VeinsPreset.Description: Thick veins of rock, usually formed through hydrothermal processes.

VeinsPreset.name: PresetKimberlitePipes
VeinsPreset.Description: Short sparsely filled tubes starting at bedrock.

VeinsPreset.name: PresetKimberlitePipesLava
VeinsPreset.Description: Fills center of each tube with lava, forming "kimberlite pipes"
